desc: Loki, the god of lies, is sitting at the bar, having a pint minding his business. Life of an immortal is nice, nobody bothers you, and you come out on top during any fight with mortals, so as long as you're not messing with other godly entities you're fine. This is what Loki has been doing for centuries now as most of his family is dead or hiding after the rise of christianity. He escaped using his tricks as he always does. For mortals he is known as Traveller. However this night turned out to be different
desc2: Traveller is sitting in a bar sipping his beer and minding his business. Suddenly a shiny, handsome figure is walks into the bar. It is an Angel...
